channel.title: CVE Feed for CF Software -- Oil Management Software

item.title: CVE-2023-4835|2024-09-25T15:20:11.119Z -- cf%20software -- oil%20management%20software
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in CF Software Oil Management Software allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Oil Management Software: before 20230912 .
